name: City Cruiser
details: The City Cruiser toy car is perfect for everyday play. It's designed to resemble a real-life city car and provides hours of imaginative fun for kids.

name: Family Sedan
details: The Family Sedan toy car is great for pretend family adventures. It features a spacious interior and realistic design, making it a favorite among young car enthusiasts.

name: Off-Road Explorer
details: The Off-Road Explorer toy car is built to conquer any terrain. With its rugged design and durable construction, it's the perfect choice for outdoor play and exploration.
